instruction: List three benefits of using online collaboration tools
output:
1. Increased collaboration and communication - Online collaboration tools can make it easier for team members to communicate, collaborate, and share information with one another. 
2. Improved productivity - Online collaboration tools can help to improve team productivity by making it easier to delegate tasks, track progress, and keep everyone on the same page. 
3. Streamlined workflow - Online collaboration tools can enable teams to streamline processes by automating task allocation, communication, and feedback. This can help to reduce the amount of time needed to complete tasks.
